Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.leadercard

Class MarbleLeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.leadercard.LeaderCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.card.leadercard.MarbleLeaderCard
public class MarbleLeaderCard
extends LeaderCard
This LeaderCard awards the user a conversion for white marbles to a specified Resource type (when they are picked from the Market) upon activation

  • Constructor Details

    • MarbleLeaderCard

      public MarbleLeaderCard​(int victoryPoints, ResourceType resourceType, CardColor[] requiredColors, int[] requiredQuantities)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      resourceType - Resource that the WhiteOrb can be transformed into by this card
      requiredColors - CardColor of the DevelopmentCards required to activate this card
      requiredQuantities - number of DevelopmentCards of the specified CardColor required to activate this card
      victoryPoints - the card's number of victory points

      Calls the specific method for this LeaderCard, activateMarbleEffect()
      Overrides:
      doAction in class LeaderCard
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - specifies to which PlayerBoard the discount has to be added
      Throws:
      CardIsActiveException - if the card is already active

    • areRequirementsMet

      public boolean areRequirementsMet​(PlayerBoard playerBoard)
      Checks if the player has enough DevelopmentCards of the required ColorTypes
      Overrides:
      areRequirementsMet in class LeaderCard
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - specifies which PlayerBoard to check
      Returns:
      returns true if the requirements are met, false otherwise

    • getResourceType

      public ResourceType getResourceType()
      Getter
      Returns:
      the ResourceType of the Resource to which the white marble can be converted

    • getRequiredColors

      public CardColor[] getRequiredColors()
      Getter
      Returns:
      an array with the colors of the DevelopmentCards that the player needs to own in order to activate this LeaderCard

    • getRequiredQuantities

      public int[] getRequiredQuantities()
      Getter
      Returns:
      an array with the number of DevelopmentCards for each color that the player needs to own in order to activate this LeaderCard

    • printLine
